name: Scary Clown Game
description:
In this Scary Clown Game you are kidnapped by a circus clown and he locked you in a room. You have to discover the way out from house by solving puzzle. Be careful, He hears everything. So, remain quite.

By mistake If you you touch any thing that create sound he hears it and comes running. But you can hide yourself in wardrobes or in rooms. Play with headphones to improve the gaming experience because the background sounds create a realistic environment.

Features:
-High-quality 3D animation of evil spirits
-Horror Haunted House 3D environment.
-3D scary clown model added.
-Frightful horror jump-scare effects
